string.value: #p1010100# in #m100000000# seems to have something she wants to say to you. Talk to #b#p1010100##k.
#p1010100# says that the porridge made of #o2220100#s is ready and asks that you deliver the #t4032458# to #p1012101#. Enter #b#m100000001##k and deliver the porridge to #b#p1012101##k.
#p1012101# seems to be feeling a little better after eating the porridge.
Evan, if you're not too busy, do you think I can ask you for a favor? I made some porridge with the #t4000009#s you brought me. Will you deliver it to #p1012101# before it gets cold?
You do know where #b#p1012101##k is, right? The two of you are pretty close, right? She is at #b#m100000001##k. It's the house on the right side of town.
Hmm... Are you busy with something? But still, helping out a friend like #p1012101# would be nice...
Cough, cough! Hi Evan, how are you? It's been a long time! I haven't seen you since my field trip to the Farm. Heh, I've been too sick to go outside... Is that lizard your pet? He's so cute...
So what brings you to #m100000000#? An errand? Or are you here to hang out with #p1012108#? Huh? #p1010100# asked you to deliver this to me? Wow, its Blue Mushroom Porridge!
Thank you so much for delivering it. Although the color looks weird, it really tastes good. Hehe, a lot of people hate it but it tastes great to me.

You haven't gone to #b#p1012101##k yet? #p1012101# lives at the #b#m100000001##k to the right side of #m100000000#... There's a Suspicous Person hanging around outside of her house who's claims that he isn't suspicious. He doesn't seem like a bad person though...
Cough cough... Don't worry, it's not Swine Flu! I think I would feel a bit better if I had some Blue Mushroom Porridge...

Huh? You lost the Blue Mushroom Porridge? You really are very clumsy. I don't remember #p1013101# being like that... Well, I have a lot of porridge left so I'll just give you more. This time, take it to #b#p1012101##k without losing it.
